LanguageData.Mousekin_RawBarley.label: mouse-ear barley
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawBarley.description: Small, edible rounded cereal grains, used in cooking or as animal feed.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawNutChonko.label: chonko nuts
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawNutChonko.description: Raw chonko nuts, resembling oversized almonds. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawNutNyam.label: nyam nuts
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawNutNyam.description: Raw nyam nuts, resembling macadamias with faint stripes. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawWheat.label: wheat
LanguageData.Mousekin_RawWheat.description: Small, edible oval cereal grains, which can be further processed into flour or used as animal feed.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Flour.label: flour
LanguageData.Mousekin_Flour.description: Finely ground powder of wheat, used in baking and cooking.
